Out-of-bag Error Measure

Source: R/MeasureOOBError.R
mlr_measures_oob_error.Rd

Returns the out-of-bag error of the Learner for learners that support it (learners with property "oob_error"). Returns NA for unsupported learners.

Dictionary

This Measure can be instantiated via the dictionary mlr_measures or with the associated sugar function msr():

mlr_measures$get("oob_error")
msr("oob_error")

Meta Information

  • Type: NA

  • Range: \((-\infty, \infty)\)

  • Minimize: NA

  • Required prediction: 'response'

See also

Dictionary of Measures: mlr_measures

as.data.table(mlr_measures) for a complete table of all (also dynamically created) Measure implementations.

Other Measure: MeasureClassif, MeasureRegr, Measure, mlr_measures_classif.costs, mlr_measures_debug, mlr_measures_elapsed_time, mlr_measures_selected_features, mlr_measures
